add(uint256,address,bool).details: 将新的lp添加到池中,只能由所有者调用

params._allocPoint: 分配给该池的分配点数。 SUSHI按块分配
params._withUpdate: 触发更新所有池的奖励变量。注意gas消耗！

dev(address).details: 通过先前的开发者地址更新开发者地址

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).details: 提款而不关心奖励。仅紧急情况

getMultiplier(uint256,uint256).details: 给出from和to的块号,返回奖励乘积

massUpdatePools().details: 更新所有池的奖励变量。注意汽油消耗

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingSushi(uint256,address).details: 查看功能以查看用户的处理中尚未领取的SUSHI

returns._0: 处理中尚未领取的SUSHI数额

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

set(uint256,uint256,bool).details: 更新给定池的SUSHI分配点。只能由所有者调用

params._allocPoint: 新的分配给该池的分配点数。 SUSHI按块分配
params._pid: 池子ID,池子数组中的索引
params._withUpdate: 触发更新所有池的奖励变量。注意gas消耗！

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updatePool(uint256).details: 将给定池的奖励变量更新为最新
